name: Cryo Crunch
description:
CryoCrunch is a game made for Ludum Dare Gamejam 47!

You control a robot by recording and sending him a sequence of moves. The goal is to lead the robot to the Keys so he can free you from your prison!

Instructions on how to play are included in the tutorial of the game.

Reference:

Z = Begin/End Recording

X = Reset robot and recording

Arrow Keys = Move

Space = Jump
